results.description: Genoa appoint former Barcelona, Inter and Paris Saint-Germain midfielder Thiago Motta as their new manager, replacing Aurelio Andreazzoli.
results.title: Thiago Motta appointed Genoa manager after Aurelio Andreazzoli sacked

results.description: Atalanta boost their hopes of a Champions League place with victory at home to Genoa.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta win boosts Champions League bid
results.title: Atalanta 2-1 Genoa: Hosts boost Champions League hopes with narrow win

results.description: Napoli draw against Genoa to make Juventus wait at least a week to seal the Serie A title.
results.title: Napoli's 1-1 draw with Genoa makes Juventus wait for Serie A title

results.description: Juventus - minus Champions League hero Cristiano Ronaldo - fall to their first Serie A defeat of the season as they suffer a shock loss at Genoa.
results.shortTitle: Juventus suffer first Serie A defeat
results.title: Juventus - minus Ronaldo - suffer first Serie A defeat of the season

thumbnail.altText: Juventus midfielder Miralem Pjanic (centre) and Martin Caceres (right)

results.description: Genoa striker Krzysztof Piatek joins Serie A rivals AC Milan to replace Gonzalo Higuain who has joined Chelsea.
results.title: Krzysztof Piatek: Genoa striker completes £30m move to AC Milan

results.description: August's Genoa bridge collapse shocked a country. As the city's teams met on Sunday, there were tributes, reflections and tales of survival against the odds.
results.shortTitle: 'My car flew down, I was resigned to death'
results.title: Genoa bridge collapse: Derby unites a city struck by 'momentous disaster'

thumbnail.altText: Davide Capello's car in the rubble of the Morandi Bridge

results.description: Napoli move up to second in Serie A as they come from behind to win at Genoa in a match interrupted by torrential rain.
results.shortTitle: Own goal seals victory for Napoli
results.title: Genoa 1-2 Napoli: Visitors come from behind in match halted by torrential rain

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo becomes the first player to score 400 goals in Europe's top five leagues as Juventus drop points for the first time.
results.title: Juventus 1-1 Genoa: Cristiano Ronaldo reaches landmark 400 goals

results.description: Juventus host Genoa in Serie A with Cristiano Ronaldo up against goal sensation Krzysztof Piatek - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Juventus v Genoa - Ronaldo reaches another landmark
results.title: Juventus v Genoa live in Serie A

results.description: Krzysztof Piatek might not be a household name but the Genoa striker's scoring feats have seen him become the first Serie A player since 1949-50 to score eight goals in his debut six top-flight games.
results.shortTitle: Piatek equals Serie A scoring record
results.title: Krzysztof Piatek: Genoa striker equals Serie A scoring record

results.description: Genoa fans watch 43 minutes of their home match with Empoli in silence in tribute to the Morandi bridge disaster victims.
results.shortTitle: Silent Genoa fans make Morandi tribute
results.title: Morandi bridge disaster: Genoa fans watch home match in silence in tribute

results.description: Genoa and Sampdoria's Serie A fixtures for Sunday are postponed following the Morandi bridge disaster.
results.shortTitle: Games off after Genoa bridge disaster
results.title: Italy bridge collapse: Genoa and Sampdoria games postponed after disaster

results.description: Hull City sign Genoa forward David Milinkovic for an undisclosed fee on a three-year deal.
results.title: David Milinkovic: Hull City sign Genoa forward for undisclosed fee

results.description: Juventus sign goalkeeper Mattia Perin from Serie A rivals Genoa three weeks after Gianluigi Buffon played his last game for the club.
results.shortTitle: Juve sign Perin after Buffon departure
results.title: Juventus sign goalkeeper Mattia Perin from Genoa after Gianluigi Buffon leaves

results.description: Raul Albiol scores the winner as Napoli close the gap on Serie A leaders Juventus to just two points.
results.title: Napoli 1-0 Genoa

results.description: Inter Milan's return to winning ways proves short-lived as they are deservedly beaten by Genoa.
results.title: Genoa 2-0 Inter Milan

results.description: French champions Monaco sign 16-year-old Genoa forward Pietro Pellegri - the first player born in 2001 to score a Serie A goal.
results.title: Pietro Pellegri: Monaco sign teenage striker from Genoa

results.description: Paulo Dybala scores his first goal in a month as Juventus beat Genoa to reach the Coppa Italia quarter-finals.
results.title: Juventus 2-0 Genoa

results.description: Napoli maintain their unbeaten start to the Serie A season by beating Genoa, while Juventus score four against SPAL.
results.title: Genoa 2-3 Napoli

results.description: AC Milan defender Leonardo Bonucci is sent off against Genoa and is likely to miss the game with former club Juventus.
results.title: AC Milan 0-0 Genoa
